person.persName: Thomas Tyler Alexander (Adair County, Kentucky, attorney, politician, judge, and provost marshal)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, attorney, politician, judge, and provost marshal. Henry County, Virginia, native. Son of Joseph Alexander and Sarah Bouldin Alexander. Married to Ellen C. Alexander. Graduated from Princeton College and the University of Louisville Law School. Attorney in Burksville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in 1850. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Adair County from 1859 to 1862 and 1863 to 1865. Attorney in Adair County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1860. Provost marshal of the fourth district of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from May 1863 to December 1863. Judge of Fifteenth Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1864 to 1874.
